# A list of standards and technologies used in Webical

== Introduction ==

The following standards and technologies are used by Webical

=== Standards ===
  * [http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2445.txt iCalendar]
  * [http://www.section508.gov/ Section 508]
  * [http://www.webdav.org/ WebDav]
  * CalDav
  * [http://www.calconnect.org/ The Calendaring and Scheduling Consortium]
